segments.text: Excuse me.Could you tell me how to return to the Hilton Hotel ? I am afraid I lost my way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a hotel card or something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see.Yes , I have the address and telephone number here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you're staying at the downtown Hilton.Then , you go down two blocks this way and turn left.You ' ll find it on the right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don't understand it very well.Will you draw me a map ?
segments.speaker: S1
